page.title: 16GAME OF BLOCKY
page.content: Blocky is a game that we play at Thwaites School which is played like this: Someone is "It" and stands by a Blocky post (anything will do) and the rest of the children hide.The child who is "It" then hunts for everyone.If he sees anyone he runs back to the Blocky post,tigs it and shouts,"Blocky one,two three!" making that child out. If anyone gets to the Blocky post before the person who is "It",he shouts,"Blocky one,two,three in!" When there is one person left,he has to get to the Blocky post before the person who is "It" and shout,"Blocky one,two,three save all!" and the person who is "It" is "It" again.Otherwise the first child who was caught is "It" for the next game. We wonder if anyone else plays this game?
